titleStmt.title: Euschēmonos kai kata taxin, or, The grounds of uniformity from I Cor. 14:40 vindicated from Mr Jeanes's exceptions to one passage in the view of the directory / by H. Hammond ...
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

titleStmt.title: Euschēmonos kai kata taxin, or, The grounds of uniformity from I Cor. 14:40 vindicated from Mr Jeanes's exceptions to one passage in the view of the directory / by H. Hammond ...
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: First four words of title in Greek characters.

Copy on reel 533 bound and filmed following the author's Ektenesteron, or, The degrees of ardency in Christs prayer reconciled with his fulnesse of habitval grace. London : Printed for R. Royston, 1656 (Wing H540).
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and the Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
